channel.title: signup on CDS - Continuous Delivery Service
channel.description: Recent content in signup on CDS - Continuous Delivery Service

item.title: verify
item.description: cdsctl signup verify Verify local CDS signup. Synopsis For admin signup INIT_TOKEN environment variable must be set. cdsctl signup verify TOKEN [flags] Options -H, --api-url string Url to your CDS api. --env Display the commands to set up the environment for the cds client. Options inherited from parent commands -c, --context string cdsctl context name -f, --file string set configuration file --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers.
